question: As per the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code (2nd Amendment) Bill 2020, what is the deadline from March 25, 2020, for which CIRP will not be initiated?
explanation:
The Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code (Second Amendment) Bill, 2020 has been recently passed in Rajya Sabha.
It amends the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code 2016 and seeks to temporarily suspend initiation of the corporate insolvency resolution process (CIRP), for six months from 25th March of this year. The Central government may extend this period to one year.
